item.title: Nicki Minaj just won a major fight for streaming that will change the music industry
item.description:
Nicki Minaj just won a major fight for streaming that will change the music industry

Streaming just won another victory in the music industry, and it'll make some artists very happy. Until now, if a musician went platinum, that certification was based purely on sales, both physical and digital. It didn't matter how many times a record was listened to on Spotify or Apple Music.

item.title: How Long Is This Gonna Take? The Time and Cost of Recording a Full-Length Album - SonicScoop
item.description:
How Long Is This Gonna Take? The Time and Cost of Recording a Full-Length Album - SonicScoop

This story first appeared in Trust Me, I'm a Scientist on May 6th, 2013. Over the past few decades, the costs of recording equipment have plummeted. Today $5,000 to $10,000 in funds can allow you to assemble a recording system that might have required a half-million dollar investment in 1993.

item.title: My GO TO...Mix Bus: Three Pros Share Their Secret Weapons - SonicScoop
item.description:
My GO TO...Mix Bus: Three Pros Share Their Secret Weapons - SonicScoop

In this edition of the GO TO series, we're focusing on the big picture. Specifically, your mix bus or master fader as it relates to mixing music. Whether you're mixing on an analog console, in the box (ITB) through your DAW or a hybrid of the two, the one constant from project to project will often be your mix bus.
